articles.title: Pilot Somehow Lands Plane After Deadly Cobra Slithered Up His SHIRT - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Pilot Rudolph Erasmus had to divert from his initial destination, but was able to cooly land his plane—and its passengers—in South Africa.
articles.content: A South African pilot says he was able to safely land his plane despite a deadly Cape cobrawhose bite can kill in just 30 minutesslithering at his feet and even at one point up his shirt. The pilot, … [+690 chars]

articles.title: Prehistoric Hunters Roasted and Ate Giant Snails 170000 Years Ago - Ancient Origins
